short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your free yellow pages data scraper.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily scrape Yellow Pages business data to a CSV file with a click of a button.

Supports Yellow pages USA and CANADA.

What Data Fields Can You Export?
With Yellow Tools at your disposal, you can effortlessly capture critical data fields, including:

Business Names
Business Categories
Business Website URLs
Business Phone Numbers
Business Email (Only Supported on Yellow Pages USA)
Business Addresses
Postal Codes
Business Ratings
Review Counts
Yellow Pages Links

Key Features:

Completely Free: Yellow Tools is a free resource, requiring no user account. Begin your lead generation journey without any cost.

Unlimited Data Extraction: Extract as much data as your business needs without any limitations, ensuring you never miss a valuable lead.

Intuitive User Interface: Our Chrome extension features a user-friendly interface, simplifying data extraction for users of all levels.

Data Precision: Rest easy knowing the data you extract is accurate and up-to-date, providing you with trustworthy insights.

Data Privacy: Your data is kept secure, as all processing occurs locally on your computer.

Unlock the potential of Yellow Tools for your lead generation today. Download our Chrome extension to empower your business with a wealth of Yellow Pages data.

Change Logs
(v1.0.5)- Fixed website URL issue, minor bug fixes and UI changes.
(v1.0.4)- Minor bug fixes.
(v1.0.3)- Added support for yellowpages.ca, now you can extract emails from yellowpages.com. Added filters to extract only the relevant details.
